name: jd3a - Java Distributed AAA
short_description:
Authentication and authorization system for large scaled web applications.   jd3a is web application that can servers requests in many ways [soap, thrift, json, http]. Main reason of creating this system is lack of AAA frameworks that are simple but safe and effective. 

jd3a supports many ways and protocols of autehtication parallel in time. 

jd3a authorization system is based on multi-dimensional authorization system. By this jd3a can simulare all standard authorizaton model like MAC, DAC, RBAC. 

Project respects requirements from OWASP - Open Web Application Security Project.
